title: Weekly Digest (28 June, 2020 - 5 July, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 26 issues were created.
Of these, 15 issues have been closed and 11 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10910 [Chat api](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10910), by [bgits](https://github.com/bgits)
:green_heart: #10909 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10909), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #10908 [[#10899] Enable notifications during onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10908), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10907 [ci: fix what version is set for iOS PR builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10907), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10901 [drop all desktop related files and references](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10901), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10899 [Enable notifications during onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10899), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10896 [[#10891] Add 'Add new contact' and 'Invite friends' button to Contact…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10896), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10895 [Push notification is generated on paired account when you send message to 1-1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10895), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10892 [Add 'Add new contact' flow to Contact screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10892), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10891 [Add 'Add new contact' and 'Invite friends' button to Contact screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10891), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10890 [Start a new chat on search](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10890), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10906 [[keycard] Fix assets message signature](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10906), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10905 [Incoming transactions in 1-1 chat doesn't change status to 'Confirmed' if sender was keycard account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10905), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10904 [disable different ID for PR builds on iOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10904), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10903 [Use new user instead recovered because message may not be received quick](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10903), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10902 [[#10469] fix typo in enter the recipient](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10902), by [hydr063n](https://github.com/hydr063n)
:heart: #10900 [Onboarding headers style](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10900), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10898 [Log level copy update](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10898), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:heart: #10897 [[#10860] Rename and move Access keys in onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10897), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10894 [Add autoscroll and animation to intro carousel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10894), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10893 [No message in 1-1 chat if sending assets to ENS name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10893), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10889 [nix: stop ndk-bundle from being cached](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10889), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10888 [Changed LOG LEVEL once in release builds makes impossible to disable logs again until reopening app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10888), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10887 [[#10868] ENS name is pending when tx has failed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10887), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10886 [[#10865] Load only the current language json on app init ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10886), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10885 [use eth.staging fleet for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10885), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10890 [Start a new chat on search](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10890), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10904 [disable different ID for PR builds on iOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10904), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
It received 10 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 32 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 14 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10910 [Chat api](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10910), by [bgits](https://github.com/bgits)
:yellow_heart: #10909 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10909), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:yellow_heart: #10908 [[#10899] Enable notifications during onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10908), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10907 [ci: fix what version is set for iOS PR builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10907), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #10901 [drop all desktop related files and references](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10901), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #10896 [[#10891] Add 'Add new contact' and 'Invite friends' button to Contact…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10896), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10884 [[Snyk] Fix for 5 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10884), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:yellow_heart: #10873 [WIP: New ui for chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10873), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10847 [[#10195] Separate keystore dir per multiacc](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10847), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10832 [WIP Android tabbar replace elevation with border](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10832), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10810 [[WIP] audio messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10810), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #10703 [WIP: Add identicon into profile qr code](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10703), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10686 [[DO NOT MERGE] Use interactive components from Quo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10686), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10620 [WIP Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 18 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10906 [[keycard] Fix assets message signature](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10906), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10903 [Use new user instead recovered because message may not be received quick](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10903), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #10902 [[#10469] fix typo in enter the recipient](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10902), by [hydr063n](https://github.com/hydr063n)
:purple_heart: #10900 [Onboarding headers style](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10900), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10898 [Log level copy update](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10898), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:purple_heart: #10897 [[#10860] Rename and move Access keys in onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10897), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10894 [Add autoscroll and animation to intro carousel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10894), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10887 [[#10868] ENS name is pending when tx has failed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10887), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10886 [[#10865] Load only the current language json on app init ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10886), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10885 [use eth.staging fleet for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10885), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10883 [nix: upgrade xcode 11.4.1 to 11.5](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10883), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10881 [[#10811] There should be an option to continue opening suspicious urls](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10881), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10879 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10879), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #10878 [[#10870] "Invalid timbre logging level" after upgrade from 1.4 to 1.4…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10878), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10877 [[#10105] Add set max to Send transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10877), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10871 [[simulated kk] Add proper signing for send/request transaction messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10871), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10867 [Add separate target/scheme for ios pr build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10867), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10861 [Disable Register button if not enough SNT for ENS name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10861), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 23 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [[keycard] Fix assets message signature](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3fe1d6e3ebc8853510ac0f11398240c39a6722fb) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update e2e test  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/16742baecd6a4ad4398cf3f542358f3ffd1dfb30) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)

:hammer_and_wrench: [[simulated kk] Add proper signing for send/request transaction messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7f1e25a5156d0ffe40b038fb9a3f5481e8ebbf65) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Use new user instead recovered because message may not be received quick  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ca75a7a057ed02232876d7d7c0cd7756f1a38cb6) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10105] Add set max to Send transaction  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/24114f7fe8cf1d1a9eab194343fac2fc25782129) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix typo in enter the recipient  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7f4476b253f245929fe7a1b9e3bdb80215953850) by [hydr063n](https://github.com/hydr063n)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Onboarding headers style  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/aa3781e5b5fa305a9183ffc30c91fa8dbd11f747) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e fix2  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6afc313a3109dc82a9b8b5a5a7fa285dbca51de3) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b008d215e60f9d6c85365c57d2a094f76a539274) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10860] Rename and move Access keys in onboarding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9619a0a204839df737d36d61bd1ab6c6f928e37f) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Disable Register button if not enough SNT for ENS name  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/dfb8420353a916a2e1b739adee0bb7e1bc175913) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update translations  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/804932e65431600e0e388f752295acc8a742286d) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10868] ENS name is pending when tx has failed  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/49744d89deccc943ff27caf5dd959911250e811b) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Log level copy update  Small change to manage #10888  Communicates that restart is required for log change to take effect.  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ac74cf01c593549d0ce05557fd5ceae13636e1fb) by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add autoscroll and animation to intro carousel  Add cancelable loop animation  Set index manually  Increase progress bar size  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e290881bf8f34a354c716766f7aff2eb6fe07f87) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [use eth.staging fleet for e2e builds  This should help us acquire more accurate statistics.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b5fda1234e5447cbc626059dfc78fcfbabc9e926) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add PR Scheme for iOs build  Build PR Scheme in PR build  use named parameters, use pr_build boolean  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>  Enable capabilities  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>  Add custom app icon  Remove user defined profile  Add PR scheme  Explicit provide provisioning profiles  Fix pr schema  Bump jenkins  Pod bump  Describe pr_build argument  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d91675116015abd0d168d8602ad24b0599c4290f) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: upgrade xcode 11.4.1 to 11.5  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c943f5f283a4c0f23c3015f4b9549e907e469dc9) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10870] "Invalid timbre logging level" after upgrade from 1.4 to 1.4.1 or relogin on 1.4.1  Signed-off-by: andrey <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/056dde0190519dc9d8d0a1c4d93158148ef86421) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
